/* è¯ä½œå±•ç¤ºä¸“ç”¨æ ·å¼ */ /* è¯ç‰Œæ ‡é¢˜ */ .poem-title { font-family: "STKaiti", "æ¥·ä½“", serif; font-size: 1.8em; color: #8B4513; text-align: center; margin: 2em 0 1em; border-bottom: 2px double #A1887F; padding-bottom: 0.5em; } /* è¯ä½œè€… */ .poem-author { font-family: "STSong", "å®‹ä½“", serif; font-size: 1.1em; color: #795548; text-align: center; font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 2em; } /* è¯æ­£æ–‡ */ .poem-content { font-family: "STKaiti", "æ¥·ä½“", serif; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 2.2; text-align: center; color: #5D4037; background: linear-gradient(to right, #FFF8E1, #FFECB3); padding: 2em; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #D7CCC8; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.1); margin: 2em auto; max-width: 800px; } /* è¯ç‰Œä¿¡æ¯ */ .poem-info { background: #F5F5F5; border-left: 4px solid #A1887F; padding: 1.5em; margin: 2em 0; font-family: "STSong", "å®‹ä½“", serif; } .poem-info dt { font-weight: bold; color: #8B4513; margin-top: 0.8em; } .poem-info dd { margin-left: 1em; color: #5D4037; } /* èµæéƒ¨åˆ† */ .poem-analysis { background: #FFF8E1; border: 1px solid #D7CCC8; padding: 2em; margin: 2em 0; border-radius: 6px; } .poem-analysis h3 { color: #8B4513; border-bottom: 1px dashed #BCAAA4; padding-bottom: 0.5em; } /* æ ¼å¾‹å¯¹ç…§ */ .rhyme-scheme { font-family: "Courier New", "STKaiti", monospace; background: #F5F5F5; padding: 1.5em; border: 1px solid #E0E0E0; overflow-x: auto; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.95em; color: #5D4037; } /* å¼•ç”¨æ ·å¼ */ .poem-quote { font-family: "STKaiti", "æ¥·ä½“", serif; font-style: italic; color: #795548; border-left: 3px solid #8B4513; padding-left: 1.5em; margin: 1.5em 0; background: #FFF8E1; padding: 1em; } /* ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯é€‚é… */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .poem-content { font-size: 1.1em; padding: 1.5em; line-height: 2; } .poem-title { font-size: 1.5em; } }

/* è¯—è¯ä¸“ç”¨æ ·å¼ - å¤å…¸æ–‡å­¦é£æ ¼ */ /* è¯—è¯å†…å®¹åŒºåŸŸ */ .poem-content { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 2em; background: #FFF8E1; border: 1px solid #D7CCC8; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.15); position: relative; } /* å¤å…¸å­—ä½“ */ .classical-font { font-family: "STKaiti", "æ¥·ä½“", "KaiTi", "SimKai", serif; line-height: 2.2; color: #5D4037; } /* è¯ç‰Œæ ‡é¢˜ */ .poem-title { text-align: center; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 2em 0; font-family: "STSong", "å®‹ä½“", serif; font-size: 0.9em; } .meter-table th, .meter-table td { border: 1px solid #D7CCC8; padding: 0.8em; text-align: center; } .meter-table th { background: #EFEBE9; color: #5D4037; font-weight: normal; } /* èµæåŒºåŸŸ */ .analysis-section { background: #F5F5F5; border-left: 4px solid #8B4513; padding: 1.5em; margin: 2em 0; font-family: "STSong", "å®‹ä½“", serif; } .analysis-section h3 { color: #5D4037; border-bottom: 1px dashed #BCAAA4; padding-bottom: 0.5em; } /* å¼•ç”¨æ ·å¼ */ .poem-quote { font-style: italic; color: #795548; border-left: 3px solid #A1887F; padding-left: 1.5em; margin: 1.5em 0; background: #FFF8E1; padding: 1em; } /* é¡µè„šæ³¨é‡Š */ .poem-footnote { text-align: right; font-size: 0.9em; color: #8D6E63; border-top: 1px solid #D7CCC8; /* è¯—æ–‡åšå®¢è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ·å¼ */ /* èµ‹æ–‡ç‰¹æ®Šæ ·å¼ */ .fu-article { border-left: 3px solid #8B4513; padding-left: 2em; margin: 2em 0; } .fu-title { font-family: "STKaiti", "æ¥·ä½“", serif; color: #5D4037; border-bottom: 1px dashed #BCAAA4; padding-bottom: 0.5em; } /* éªˆå¶å¥æ ·å¼ */ .parallel-sentence { margin: 1.5em 0; padding: 1em; background: #FFF8E1; border-radius: 5px; text-align: center; line-height: 2; } /* è¯ç‰Œæ ·å¼ */ .ci-card { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FFF, #FFF8E1); border: 2px solid #D7CCC8; border-radius: 10px; padding: 2em; margin: 2em 0; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(139, 69, 19, 0.1); } /* å¼•ç”¨æ ·å¼ */ blockquote.poem-quote { border-left: 4px solid #A1887F; background: #FFF8E1; font-style: italic; font-family: "STSong", "å®‹ä½“", serif; padding: 1.5em; margin: 2em 0; } /* é¡µè„šç¾åŒ– */ .footer { border-top: 2px solid #D7CCC8; padding-top: 2em; color: #795548; } /* æ ‡ç­¾äº‘æ ·å¼ */ .tag-cloud a { display: inline-block; background: #EFEBE9; color: #5D4037; padding: 3px 12px; margin: 5px; border-radius: 15px; border: 1px solid #D7CCC8; transition: all 0.3s; } .tag-cloud a:hover { background: #8B4513; color: white; transform: translateY(-2px); }
